Side Effects: fatigue_ taste in mouth_ sore throat_ low blood pressure_ breathing difficulties_ night sweats_ rhinitis_ eye discharge_ marginal eye crusting
Comments: I had not realized that Vexol was making me miserable until after I had discontinued usage.  My eye did heal_ but several of my side effects are considered severe.  The breathing problems became bad enough that I had to take breaks while eating because I could not get enough oxygen_ and I even had x-rays taken.
